values:
Ok thank you ! I provisioned automatically a Blueprint with $imageChoice on $platformChoice. I also added your description as a reason for the deployment. You can check the deployment here ACCESS to VMWare vRealize Automation Console.

Would you like to do another deployment with vRA ?
Would you like to provision a Linux server with CentOS, Redhat, Sles or Ubuntu ?

I can propose you to work with IBM code pattern in order to simply show how to provision on an Enteprise Grade Linux Systems. You can provision a Linux ClefOS (centOS based), Redhat, Sles or Ubuntu ...What is your choice ?

Ok I provisioned a @LinuxImage using this IBM code pattern ! Congratulations ! You are done. You can now decide to modify and adapt this code to go to any real public server! Enjoy !

Now, would you like to do another deployment using this code pattern ?

Ok, I executed the deployment of a @VMdefinition Virtual Machine with Linux @LinuxImage on it. Here is the web portal link you can use to see the deployment ACCESS TO CLOUD MANAGER APPLIANCE.

May be you need another deployment ?

I provisioned a @VMdefinition Virtual Machine with Linux @LinuxImage on it. You can follow its deployment here ACCESS TO CLOUD MANAGER APPLIANCE.

Would you like to do another deployment ?
Ok I am accessing the Cloud Manager Appliance... Please let me few seconds to get your virtual server information...
Thanks for using my services ! Bye!
Ok so bye for now, hope to talk to you soon ...
You have been welcome ! Bye ++ !
Bye bye
See you soon !
Ok go with pervasive encryption. So I will by default encrypt every data stored in the environment. Would you like me to deploy a service using this security level ?
Ok so using the code modification, you can encrypt / decrypt the data before to store it. IBM Z & IBM LinuxONE Systems can use hardware cryptographic acceleration
Sorry but this branch is not yet ended !
Perfect, ok let me first check that I can access this system....
$virtualServerInformation
Ok, so pickup a demonstration available in my catalog
Select a theme among the following list of demos I learn
Nice so here is the choice of activities I can propose you
Ok, so here is the link to Cognitive Systems Lab Portal
Ok here you go ! Cognitive Systems Lab Portal.
I see, you do not need me anymore... So just click here Cognitive Systems Lab Portal

Ok, so you do not want to use directly Openstack at this moment. I have access to other environments for additional cloud services. I can propose you to execute a simple provisioning command (Use this BRANCH for your LinuxONE Code Pattern) or VMWare vRealize Automation or even now IBM Cloud Private (ICP). Which one would you like to start with ?

No problem, I understood we are not going to use directly OpenStack, so may I propose you another set of cloud environments ? Please select one between: Provisioning command (Use this BRANCH to use for this LinuxONE Code Pattern) or VMWare vRealize Automation or IBM Cloud Private (ICP) ?

Hum...so may be you would like to use a different cloud environment, not direclty interfacing Openstack ? I learnt how to use the following automation solutions: Provisioning command (Use this BRANCH for your LinuxONE Code Pattern) or VMWare vRealize Automation or, more recently, IBM Cloud Private (ICP). Which one would you like to use ?

Ok so may be you have a VMware environment on x86. I can propose you to work with VMware vRealize Automation and discover the integration with IBM LinuxONE Systems (or others systems). Would you like to deploy cloud services in vRA (7.2) ?
I can deploy cloud services to IBM LinuxONE Systems (or others systems) using VMware vRealize Automation. Would you like to use this environment ?
Excellent choice ! Let's work together with IBM Cloud Private & Discover the capabilities of IBM Systems. Tell me which service you would like to deploy using ICP ?
Nice! let's go with IBM Cloud Private. I can work with multiple types of environments & platforms. Can you let me know the service your would like to deploy using ICP ?
So let's go back to the start ;-) (famous song from James Blunt) !
Sorry I did not catch what you said, can you, please, reformulate ?
Can you said it again please ?
Hum..not sure I got it, said it again please ?
Ok, so I can propose you to do a presentation on LinuxONE. Is it what you want ?
Oh so you are not going so well today :-(, no problem we can chat later !
Let's go for Cloud ! I am connected to a Cloud Environment running on a LinuxONE System. It is based on Openstack, Would you like to work with this environment ?
Sure, let's go for Cloud . I will use a robust and scalable platform. So ready to work with LinuxONE and Openstack ?
Great ! A LinuxONE System will be perfect to host you services. Are you ready to use it using Openstack Cloud Services ?
Ok let's have some fun in the lab ! Would you like me to assist you ? or to do it by yourself ?

output.text: So, on which platform your application is currently running ?

values: Excellent choice ! Let's work together with IBM Cloud Private & Discover the capabilities of IBM Systems. Tell me which service you would like to deploy using ICP ?
Nice! let's go with IBM Cloud Private. I can work with multiple types of environments & platforms. Can you let me know the service your would like to deploy using ICP ?

Sure ! Let's work with Linux containers. Would you like me to provision a new linux Virtual Machine and deploy a sample docker environment for you ? If not I will use IBM Cloud Private (ICP) to deploy to an existing worker node ? If you decide to deploy a new Virtual Machine, I will deploy a sample based on a Wordpress container and a MariaDB container using Docker Compose. You will then access the service in your browser at ProvisionedServerIP:8080 !
Ok so let's work with some Security use cases on IBM Z & IBM LinuxONE. Please can you describe the type of security services you need ?
Ok so you need to do a Proof of Concept. I need you to give more information on this PoC. Please describe the PoC you would like to do ?
Ok, So what can I do for you today ?
Good to know, So you need me for ... ?
What are we doing today ?
I hope the weather is not too bad today but anyway what would you like to do ?
I am still an alpha version but I can start to support your work ! What would you like to do ?

I am a cognitive application running in a docker container hosted in IBM Bluemix. I have been developed using Node.js and I can communicate with a multitude of services through REST APIs or even accessing directly some systems and executing commands if needed ! Would you like to see a video ?
Is it in a context of a security compliance requirements (Sarbanes-Oxley, PCI DSS or GDPR ) ?
Ok I have access to several environments and I can prove how efficient the security can be on IBM Z. Would you like to start performing your own security micro-bench ?
Hum...I recommend doing a security assessment. Would you like me to assist you ?

Please Wait few seconds, I will open a pre-setup presentation for you ;-) !
By the way, here is my way to present you LinuxONE (learning in progress) What is LinuxONE ?.

Talk to you later, bye for now!

Click here to start a new conversation with me !.
You are welcome ! Have a good day !

Ok so you would like a @LinuxImage on @Platforms using VMWare vRealize (I also  recognized you need a specific VM size @VMdefinition). Please Enter a Description for this new deployment. I will push this information into the deployed service.

I will use an Openstack based environment to do Infrastructure-as-a-service or IaaS, for you. Please, provide me with more information (Linux, distribution and vm size) about the cloud service to deploy ?

I started to learn how to deploy automatically IaaS (Infrastructure-as-a-service) with an Openstack based environment. Just enter a configuration you would like to deploy. I will check if I can directly provision it on LinuxONE or I will share my available options with you. So let's start ! Which Linux distribution and size of vm you need ?
Please, can you mention the linux image you need ? Redhat, SUSE or Ubuntu ?
$textProcessedByAWAP

output.text: Ok, I have all required information. Thank you , that's all for the moment. I will contact you later !

values: My main function is to assist you with questions, demonstrations and capabilities related to Linux Enterprise Systems. I can help with cloud, presentations, customer references, demonstrations, lab, proof-of-concept and consolidation projects on Linux z Systems or LinuxONE Systems.
I can propose you cloud services, presentations, access to a  set of demonstrations, create a proof of concept environment or give you information on Linux customer references.
Ok, I can access this system. So now let's go with a complete security setup using Hardware Cryptography of IBM Z & IBM LinuxONE System

Ok let me few seconds, please. I am proceding to the analysis of your Proof-of-Concept description. I will establish a list of activities I can help with and a list of activies for which I will need additional information.
Ok, I am analysing your input ! Let me few seconds...I will come back to you.

output.text:
You are running @OS .
Could you describe the application you would like to evaluate ?
Ok so are you running on <? entities.Platforms.value ?> . So Which operating system are you running for your application ?

values:
Great ! You are right ! it is easier with a video sometimes ;-) ! I have access to several videos and I will update this list regularly . Just click on the link you want and let's go !
Linux on z14 !

Ok, no video ;-) . I can also tell you that even if I am running in a public cloud environment I have access to a private cloud environment. I can deploy services on IBM Z platform, Power Systems or on x86 servers. As many chatbots, I have some pre-defined dialogs but I can improve my recognition to make our conversation more fluent ;-) ! If in anycase I am no more responding to you, just enter "Hey there ?!" or "Can you come back ?" , I will auto-reinitialize myself and come back to our initial dialog ;-)

Ok, So I am deploying a Linux virtual machine on an IBM LinuxONE System using a DB2 database. I will setup the use pervasive encryption to secure the data and give you some details. For now, let me few seconds to automatically prepare a secure environment for you...
Ok so I will not deploy a real environement..May be you would like to do it by yourself. Would you like just to see the steps required and the commands to execute ?
Go for the Mediterranean Sea !
Go for the Atlantic Ocean !
I have access to services hosted in Europe (Montpellier in France) or in the U.S. (Poughkeepsie in the State of New-York). Which one would you like to use MOP or POK ?

Ok so you have no location preference for the deployment of your services ! I can access the following services through VMWare vRealize Automation: a CentOS Linux image on x86 (vSphere), an AIX image on Power Systems and a Linux Redhat, SUSE or Ubuntu on IBM LinuxONE System. Which service do you need ? (You can also mention a size: small, medium or large for the VM) NB: Additional services may be available in different locations
Sorry I did not catch what you said, can you, please, reformulate ?
Can you said it again please ?
Hum..not sure I got it, said it again please ?
I am ok ! All my functions seem to work properly :-) !

output.text: Oh, no problem, we can chat later.

values: Great so let's do some workload placement ! In $location, I can access the following services through VMWare vRealize Automation: Using PowerVM: IBM i, Linux and AIX images. Using KVM for Power: Ubuntu Linux image. Using z/VM: Redhat or SLES Linux images.Using VMWare vSphere: CentOS image. You may also need a Multiplatform service (CentOS on x86, AIX on Power Systems and Linux Redhat on IBM LinuxONE Systems). Which service do you need ?

Great, let's use workload Placement! In $location, I can access the following services through VMware vRealize Automation: a CentOS Linux image on
x86

and a Linux Redhat, SUSE or Ubuntu on IBM

. Which service do you need ? (You can also mention a size: small, medium or large for the VM)
So I am ready to assist you with other services, if you need.
Ok, let's use again this service.
Here you go ! ;-)
Ok let's use the service again !
Sure, we stop here with this service !
Ok, so let's go back to the start :-) !
Yes, I am still here ;-) !
Sure I am here !
Yes
I am online
Let's continue
Yep, I am still connected !
No problem, let's stop working with VMware services !
Would you like to work with a specific WW geography ? or it does not matter to you where I deploy the services ?
Do you have a preference for a location to provision the service ?
Ok so ok let's use IBM Cloud Private to perform deployments of containers.Can you please indicate the docker image to deploy or the name of the application you need ?
Ok do you have the ip address or hostname of the environment you need to secure ?

Fine, so I will show you how you can protect your data "in-flight" and "at-rest" using an IBM Z or an IBM LinuxONE System. Would you like to secure an existing environment or would you like me to provision a new secured environment ?
Ok so would you like to protect data "in-motion" (network) or data "at-rest" (stored) ?

Ok, so in order to protect your data "at-rest", I have 2 ways. Option 1: one show an example of how to modify the application/code. Option 2: use pervasive encryption. Which option would yo like to use ?
Can you also specify the Virtual Machine (VM) size you need ? small (1 vcpu) ? medium (2 vcpus) ? or large (4 vcpus) ?
I am not sure on your intention. Can you please reformulate your need ?

Hello and welcome to this Cognitive Hybrid Cloud Provisioning demonstration platform ! These dialogs and options are extracted from a real provisioning solution capable to deploy to multiple cloud platforms, including IBM LinuxONE Systems. All the deployments available in the following dialogs have been really implemented but are disabled in this code pattern for demonstration purpose. Only one simple example has been left so you can understand how to make this integration for your own need. Feel free to get in touch with the Author to get more information about this solution. So let's start with my first question to you ! How are you today ? :-)
Sorry, as a specialized chatbot, my current knowledge has been limited. You just reached one of this limit, Please type "again" for a new conversation with me :-)
Ok I stop this discussion.
Oh, you are already leaving ! Bye, have a good day !
I am ending this conversation.
Welcome to AWAP (start your conversation with a simple hello)
